    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_94790</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94790</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mechanical properties of metals and non-metals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechanische Eigenschaften der Metalle und der 
Nichtmetalle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propriétés mécaniques des métaux et des 
non-métaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Propriedades mecânicas dos metais e dos 
não-metais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proprietà meccaniche dei metalli e dei 
metalloidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μηχανικές ιδιότητες των μετάλλων και των αμέταλλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Características mecánicas de metales y de no 
metales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that metals can be bent many times before breaking while non-metal solids break easily. Examples are lead and carbon.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bending</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">breaking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanical properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">non-metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Metalle verbogen 
werden können viele Male, bevor man bricht, während 
Nichtmetallkörper leicht brechen. Beispiele sind Leitung und 
Carbon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que des métaux peuvent
être dépliés beaucoup de fois avant la rupture tandis que les 
solides de non-métal se cassent facilement. Les exemples sont 
fil de sortie et carbone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os metais podem ser 
dobrados muitas vezes antes de quebrar quando os sólidos do 
não-metal quebrarem fàcilmente. Os exemplos são ligação e 
carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i metalli possono
essere piegati molte volte prima di rompersi mentre i solidi del 
metalloide si rompono facilmente. Gli esempi sono cavo e 
carbonio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα μέταλλα μπορούν να 
καμφθούν πολλές φορές πρίν σπάζουν ενώ τα στερεά αμέταλλων 
σπάζουν εύκολα. Τα παραδείγματα είναι μόλυβδος και 
άνθρακας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los metales se 
pueden doblar muchas veces antes de romperse mientras que los sólidos
del no metal se rompen fácilmente. Los ejemplos son terminal de
componente y carbón.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbiegen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechen</string>
          </keyword>
